info.title: RPG Conjunto API
info.description: API for managing users, characters, and campaigns in the RPG Conjunto application.

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve all users.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new user.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity (validation failed or user already exists)

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve.

put.description: Endpoint to update an existing user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete.

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve a user by their email.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of the user to retrieve.

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve an archetype by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archetype to retrieve

put.description: Endpoint to update an existing archetype.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archetype to update

delete.description: Endpoint to delete an existing archetype.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archetype to delete

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve all archetypes.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new archetype.

parameters.description: ID of the character to update

delete.description: Endpoint to delete a character by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the character to delete

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve all characters for a specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose characters to retrieve
